name: SPACEbar the game
description:
SPACEbar The Game is a game made in 4 days for the Novice Summer Jam Series: One-Button Input Jam. 

The game consists of passing levels without dying, but you can only move with SPACE. An arrow goes around your player while changing direction, and when you press SPACE you move towards the current direction of the arrow.

The game is a prototype of an idea that can be exploited by adding more traps, levels, ...
